The company shipped 382,000 cars and trucks in the last three months of the year, down 6 percent from the third quarter. It can safely be said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, Sergio Marchionne , who also heads Fiat, said in the statement.
